attributes.action: Restrict flights from London City Airport to Monday - Friday only and reroute the flight path
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Flight departures and arrivals should only be allowed from the City Airport on Mondays - Fridays. There is sufficient capacity at the other three London Airports to meet any weekend demand. 

Flights should be restricted to the Thames Gateway to minimise the impact on the local communities.  Accident statistics show that over 53% of flight accidents are within 10km of the airport, with over 20% during takeoff.  The Government should not be taking risks with the lives of the local communities and transport infrastructure. A route that follows the Thames would reduce the risk.

Permitted noise and pollution levels should be reduced year on year to take advantage of all the latest technology advances to minimise impact to local communities.

Data Source ARCO , Geneva -Switzerland

http://www.baaa-acro.com/Statistiques%20diverses.htm
